text: Katrin Adlkofer or Kathrin Adlkofer (born 5 September 1966 in Munich) is a German sailor.Katrin Adlkofer at Sports Reference Together with Susanne Bauckholt she won the world championship in the 470 in 1987 and 1989. They also and competed at 1988 and 1996 Olympics, finishing fifth each time. ==References== ==External links== * (Federal Republic of Germany) * (Germany) * * Category:1966 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Munich Category:German female sailors (sport) Category:Sailors at the 1988 Summer Olympics – 470 Category:Sailors at the 1996 Summer Olympics – 470 Category:Olympic sailors of Germany Category:470 class world champions Category:World champions in sailing for Germany
title: Katrin Adlkofer
